summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for construction of trolley poles and wires generally along Rainier Avenue South from South Jackson Street to South Prentice Street in conjunction with the City's Rainier Avenue South and Columbia City LID projects; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; increasing an expenditure allowances in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund.
